variable.name: %%port_number%%
variable.title: Ports
variable.info: Define the amount of FXO ports your Patton device has
variable.result: context cs no IF_FXO_01 no IF_FXO_02 no IF_FXO_03 no IF_FXO_04 no IF_FXO_05 no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
context cs no IF_FXO_02 no IF_FXO_03 no IF_FXO_04 no IF_FXO_05 no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
context cs no IF_FXO_03 no IF_FXO_04 no IF_FXO_05 no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
context cs no IF_FXO_04 no IF_FXO_05 no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
context cs no IF_FXO_05 no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
context cs no IF_FXO_06 no IF_FXO_07
port fxo 0 1 shutdown port fxo 0 2 shutdown port fxo 0 3 shutdown port fxo 0 4 shutdown port fxo 0 5 shutdown port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
port fxo 0 2 shutdown port fxo 0 3 shutdown port fxo 0 4 shutdown port fxo 0 5 shutdown port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
port fxo 0 3 shutdown port fxo 0 4 shutdown port fxo 0 5 shutdown port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
port fxo 0 4 shutdown port fxo 0 5 shutdown port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
port fxo 0 5 shutdown port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
port fxo 0 6 shutdown port fxo 0 7 shutdown
route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01
route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02
route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_FXO_03
route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_FXO_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_FXO_04

route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_FXO_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_FXO_04 route call 6 dest-interface IF_FXO_05

route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_FXO_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_FXO_04 route call 6 dest-interface IF_FXO_05 route call 7 dest-interface IF_FXO_06

route call 1 dest-interface IF_FXO_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_FXO_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_FXO_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_FXO_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_FXO_04 route call 6 dest-interface IF_FXO_05 route call 7 dest-interface IF_FXO_06 route call 8 dest-interface IF_FXO_07

variable.name: %%outbound_delay%%
variable.title: Dial Delay
variable.info: Specify the time to wait on the line before dialing the outgoing call.

variable.name: %%hunt_mode%%
variable.title: Hunting Mode
variable.info: Select whether the hunting of the ports should be Normal (Always starts from the first interface) or Cyclic (Round-Robin)

variable.name: %%default_router%%
variable.title: Default IP Route
variable.info: Please specify the Default Route IP Address for the device

variable.name: %%dns_server%%
variable.title: DNS Server IP Address
variable.info: Please specify the DNS Server IP Address for the device

variable.name: %%cloud_connect%%
variable.title: Patton Cloud Connect - Organization Key
variable.info: To connect your SmartNode to the Patton Cloud, enter in your Organization Key.

device.deviceconfig:
######################################################### # # For Patton 2-8 port FXO # Supported firmware versions - Trinity 3.x # # Author: Patton Support # Support Contact: support@patton.com # ######################################################### cli version 4.00
profile aaa DEFAULT method 1 local method 2 none
telnet-server use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
ssh-server use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
snmp-server shutdown
web-server protocol http port 80 protocol https port 443 use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
ntp server 0.patton.pool.ntp.org server 1.patton.pool.ntp.org server 2.patton.pool.ntp.org server 3.patton.pool.ntp.org no shutdown
dns-client name-server %%dns_server%% name-server 8.8.8.8
profile ppp DEFAULT
%%tone_set_data%%
profile tone-set DEFAULT
profile fxo DEFAULT electrical-standard us caller-id standard fsk-bell loop-break duration min 200 max 250 disconnect-signal busy-tone disconnect-signal loop-break %%tone_set_data[3]%%
profile voip DEFAULT codec 1 g711ulaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20 silence-suppression codec 2 g711alaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20 silence-suppression codec 3 g729 rx-length 20 tx-length 20 silence-suppression fax transmission 1 relay t38-udp fax transmission 2 bypass g711ulaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20
profile pstn DEFAULT
profile sip DEFAULT
context ip ROUTER
interface WAN ipaddress DHCP tcp adjust-mss rx mtu tcp adjust-mss tx mtu
interface LAN ipaddress LAN %%gateway_ip%% %%gateway_mask%% tcp adjust-mss rx mtu tcp adjust-mss tx mtu
routing-table DEFAULT route 0.0.0.0/0 gateway %%default_router%%
context cs SWITCH
routing-table called-e164 RT_FXO_TO_SIP route default dest-interface IF_SIP_3CX
service hunt-group HG_TO_FXO %%hunt_mode%% drop-cause destination-out-of-order drop-cause user-busy drop-cause normal-unspecified drop-cause no-circuit-channel-available drop-cause network-out-of-order drop-cause temporary-failure drop-cause SWITCHing-equipment-congestion drop-cause access-info-discarded drop-cause circuit-channel-not-available drop-cause resources-unavailable %%port_number[3]%%
interface sip IF_SIP_3CX bind context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX early-disconnect route call dest-service HG_TO_FXO remote %%param::defaultlocalip%% %%param::sipport%% trust remote address-translation outgoing-call request-uri user-part fix %%line_int_num_0%% host-part to-header target-param none address-translation incoming-call called-e164 request-uri
interface fxo IF_FXO_00 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_01 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_02 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_03 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_04 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_05 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_06 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
interface fxo IF_FXO_07 route call dest-table RT_FXO_TO_SIP %%outbound_delay%%
context cs SWITCH no shutdown
authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX realm 1 3CXPhoneSystem username %%line_auth_id_0%% password %%line_auth_pw_0%%
location-service LOC_SVC_3CX_%%line_int_num_0%% domain 1 %%param::defaultlocalip%% match-any-domain
identity-group DEFAULT authentication outbound authenticate 1 authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX username %%line_auth_id_0%%
identity %%line_int_num_0%% authentication outbound authenticate 1 authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX
registration outbound registrar %%param::defaultlocalip%% %%param::sipport%% lifetime 60 register auto
context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX bind location-service LOC_SVC_3CX_%%line_int_num_0%%
interface IF_GW_SIP_3CX transport-protocol udp+tcp 5060 no transport-protocol tls bind ipaddress ROUTER LAN LAN
context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX no shutdown
nodems-client server https://nodems.patton.io:443 organization-key %%cloud_connect%% resource any no shutdown
port ethernet 0 0 bind interface ROUTER LAN no shutdown
port ethernet 0 1 bind interface ROUTER WAN no shutdown
port fxo 0 0 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000000 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_00 no shutdown
port fxo 0 1 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000001 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_01 no shutdown
port fxo 0 2 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000002 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_02 no shutdown
port fxo 0 3 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000003 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_03 no shutdown
port fxo 0 4 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000004 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_04 no shutdown
port fxo 0 5 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000005 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_05 no shutdown
port fxo 0 6 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000006 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_06 no shutdown
port fxo 0 7 %%tone_set_data[2]%% subscriber-number 000007 bind interface SWITCH IF_FXO_07 no shutdown
%%port_number%% %%port_number[2]%%
